name: Florida Coast to Coast Helicopters, Inc.
about: Florida Coast to Coast Helicopters, Inc. is dedicated to providing professional, safe, and cost-effective helicopter services across Florida. Based at the Pompano Beach Airpark, we serve Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach Counties, as well as the entire state and beyond. We offer aerial photography, sightseeing tours, flight instruction under Part 61, and special services such as frost patrol and biology surveys. Our helicopters are purchased new from the factory and maintained by factory-trained mechanics, ensuring they meet the highest safety standards as a Robinson Helicopters Authorized Service Center. Our pilots undergo rigorous ground school, flight training, and quarterly exams to ensure they adhere to our safety philosophy. With competitive rates and financing options available, we are committed to delivering exceptional helicopter services.
